abstract: Amgen and Celgene are separately acquiring two smaller companies that are harnessing novel technologies to develop drug treatments for leukemias and lymphomas.
snippet: Amgen and Celgene are separately acquiring two smaller companies that are harnessing novel technologies to develop drug treatments for leukemias and lymphomas.
lead_paragraph: Two big biotechnology companies announced on Thursday that they would buy smaller companies that are harnessing novel technologies to develop drug treatments for leukemias and lymphomas.

headline.main: 2 Biotech Firms Bolster Their Drug Pipelines Through Deals
